A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Sad and disappointed. What a difference between the audience reaction I witnessed for The Force Awakens (ecstatic) and The Last Jedi\, which was muted other than for cheering at the opening fanfare and at the end for a message about Carrie Fisher. As we walked out\, I overheard other people speaking in the same bewildered and confused tones that I felt. So much in this film that should have been explored more deeply and with more care\, is instead treated in a frustratingly shallow\, unimaginative\, and trite way.
